column4: i have same problem if i run it on 1 system and go over to another system the kernel seems to crash but if i keep it on same system i originally booted from i have no problems
oh...i'm having a different issue. the version boots on other systems but not on the system i copied it from
yes it uses the original system u booted from try reinstalling and running it from that system only
my usb version works on every other system except on the system it was copied from
